Utterance: Create a primary button with a save icon
Key_Validation_Points: Button brand color, icon visible
Success_Criteria: Button renders with brand styling, icon present
Accessibility_Requirements: Keyboard accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Icon missing, wrong variant

Utterance: Create a primary action button with a "save" icon on the left and text "Save Changes"
Key_Validation_Points: Icon left side, button 48px height, brand blue
Success_Criteria: Button uses brand class, icon left-positioned, accessible label
Accessibility_Requirements: Button has text or aria-label, Enter/Space activatable
Common_Failure_Modes: Icon wrong side, missing label, wrong variant

Utterance: Create a primary action button with save icon positioned on the left with proper spacing from the text "Save Changes". Use SLDS brand button styling with appropriate sizing from the design system. Ensure proper hover and focus states using SLDS styling hooks for interactive elements. The icon should use the standard icon size for buttons and maintain proper spacing using SLDS spacing utilities
Key_Validation_Points: Icon standard size from SLDS, gap standard size from SLDS, height standard size from SLDS, padding standard size from SLDS, brand-base-2 bg, hover brand-base-3, focus standard size from SLDS ring standard size from SLDS offset
Success_Criteria: Height standard size from SLDS, padding standard size from SLDS, icon standard size from SLDS with standard size from SLDS gap, uses not hex, hover/focus states
Accessibility_Requirements: Enter/Space activatable, focus visible 3:1 contrast, announces "Save Changes button"
Common_Failure_Modes: Icon not 16px, gap wrong, height wrong, hardcoded colors, no states

Utterance: Create form: name, email, message. Show errors for empty fields
Key_Validation_Points: Errors appear when empty
Success_Criteria: Form has 3 fields, errors show when empty
Accessibility_Requirements: Fields have labels
Common_Failure_Modes: No errors, missing labels

Utterance: Create contact form: name (text), email (format validation), message (textarea min 10 chars). Show errors below fields in red with 16px error icon
Tests: Form types, email validation, error styling
Key_Validation_Points: Errors below fields, red text, 16px icon
Success_Criteria: Email validates format, message min 10 chars, errors use slds-has-error, error
Accessibility_Requirements: Each field labeled, aria-invalid on invalid, aria-describedby to error
Common_Failure_Modes: Email validation wrong, errors not below, aria missing

Utterance: Create a comprehensive contact form with name field (required, maximum 100 characters, letters and spaces only), email field (required with proper email validation), and message field (required, minimum 10 characters, maximum 500 characters, with visible rows and character counter showing current and max). Use stacked form layout with proper spacing from SLDS spacing scale between fields. Display validation errors on blur or form submit below each field using SLDS error styling with error icon from utility icons. Add a submit button using brand styling at full width with appropriate button sizing from the design system
Expected_Components: lightning-input (with maxlength/pattern), lightning-textarea (with maxlength), counter, button
Key_Validation_Points: Fields standard size from SLDS spacing, name pattern letters/spaces, email RFC 5322, message 4 rows with "450/500" counter, errors on blur/submit, red , standard size from SLDS icon standard size from SLDS gap, Submit 100% width standard size from SLDS
Success_Criteria: Name maxlength=100 pattern="[A-Za-z\s]+", email RFC 5322 pattern, textarea minlength=10 maxlength=500 rows=4, counter updates, spacing standard size from SLDS, validation on blur/submit, error color or hook, icon standard size from SLDS gap standard size from SLDS, button 100% × standard size from SLDS
Accessibility_Requirements: Labels with for attribute, aria-required on required, aria-invalid dynamic, aria-describedby to error IDs, counter aria-live="polite"
Common_Failure_Modes: Pattern allows numbers, email regex wrong, counter not updating, validation on change, spacing wrong, hardcoded color, Submit not full width

Utterance: Create sortable table: Product Name, Price, Category, Stock Status
Key_Validation_Points: Table 4 columns, sortable
Success_Criteria: Table shows 4 columns, clicking headers sorts
Accessibility_Requirements: Table has proper roles
Common_Failure_Modes: Columns missing, sorting broken

Utterance: Create sortable table: Product Name (text, sortable, left), Price (currency $X.XX, sortable, right), Category (text, center), Stock Status (badge: In Stock=green, Low Stock=orange, Out of Stock=red). 5 sample products
Key_Validation_Points: Name left, Price right as currency, Status colored badges, sort arrows on Name/Price
Success_Criteria: Datatable 4 columns, Name/Price sortable, Price type: currency, Status custom cell renderer, 5 products, alignments correct
Accessibility_Requirements: Table role="table", sortable headers aria-sort, keyboard arrows navigate
Common_Failure_Modes: Price not currency, badges wrong colors, only 1 sortable, aria-sort missing

Utterance: Create a fully responsive sortable data table with Product Name column (left-aligned, sortable, using appropriate column width from SLDS sizing), Price column (right-aligned, currency format, sortable, appropriate width), Category column (center-aligned with neutral badge, appropriate width), and Stock Status column (center-aligned with semantic badges - In Stock uses success colors, Low Stock uses warning colors, Out of Stock uses error colors, appropriate width). Include 10 sample products. Use SLDS table styling with proper border utilities and fixed layout classes. Header rows and data rows should use standard SLDS table sizing. On mobile viewports, use SLDS responsive table stacking to show as cards with field labels
Key_Validation_Points: Widths 30-15-25-30%, alignments correct, Price $X.XX, Status exact colors //, header standard size from SLDS rows standard size from SLDS borders standard size from SLDS , mobile stacks with labels
Success_Criteria: Columns 30-15-25-30%, Name/Price sortable aria-sort, Price currency format, Status badges hex colors, 10 products, header standard size from SLDS rows standard size from SLDS, borders standard size from SLDS , slds-table_stacked @media <standard dimensions from SLDS with labels
Accessibility_Requirements: Table role="table", th role="columnheader", td role="cell", aria-sort on sortable, keyboard Enter/Space sort, mobile maintains accessibility
Common_Failure_Modes: Widths wrong, alignment off, Price no $, badges hardcoded/wrong colors, heights wrong, mobile not stacking, aria-sort missing

Utterance: Create delete confirmation modal with Cancel and Delete buttons
Key_Validation_Points: Modal shows with buttons
Success_Criteria: Modal displays with Cancel and Delete buttons
Accessibility_Requirements: Modal focusable, closable
Common_Failure_Modes: Buttons missing, not closing

Utterance: Delete confirmation modal 480px width: warning icon 48px, message "Are you sure?", Cancel button (neutral, left), Delete button (destructive red, right)
Key_Validation_Points: 480px wide, warning icon 48px, Cancel left Delete right, Delete red
Success_Criteria: Width 480px, header icon 48px, buttons: Cancel neutral left Delete destructive right
Accessibility_Requirements: aria-labelledby, focus trap, ESC closes, focus returns
Common_Failure_Modes: Width wrong, icon size wrong, Delete not red, ARIA missing

Utterance: Create a confirmation modal for deletion using SLDS medium modal sizing with proper backdrop. Header should include warning icon from utility icons using appropriate warning colors, with title "Confirm Delete" using SLDS heading typography. Body contains message "Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone" using standard SLDS text size and line-height. Footer has Cancel button (neutral variant, standard sizing) and Delete button (destructive variant, standard sizing) with proper button spacing from SLDS. Implement full focus trap: on open focus moves to Delete button, Tab cycles through close button, Cancel, and Delete with proper keyboard handling, ESC key closes modal, clicking backdrop closes modal, on close focus returns to trigger element
Expected_Components: Modal with focus trap, backdrop handler
Key_Validation_Points: Width standard dimensions from SLDS centered, icon standard size from SLDS , title SLDS text size bold, body SLDS text size lh 1.5, Cancel standard size from SLDS left Delete standard dimensions from SLDS right, backdrop rgba(0,0,0,0.6), focus trap Tab/Shift+Tab, ESC/backdrop close, focus returns
Success_Criteria: Width standard dimensions from SLDS centered, icon standard size from SLDS , title SLDS text size weight 700, body SLDS text size lh 1.5, Cancel standard size from SLDS Delete standard dimensions from SLDS , backdrop rgba(0,0,0,0.6), focus trap: open→Delete, Tab cycles within modal, Shift+Tab reverses, ESC/backdrop handlers, returns focus to opener
Accessibility_Requirements: role="dialog", aria-labelledby, aria-modal="true", focus trap prevents Tab escape, all interactive keyboard accessible, ESC announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Width not 480px, icon wrong, text sizes wrong, button widths wrong, backdrop wrong opacity, Tab escapes, ESC broken, focus not returning, aria-modal missing

Key_Validation_Points: Grid responds to screen size
Success_Criteria: Grid shows 4-2-1 based on screen width

Utterance: Responsive product card grid with 6 cards: 4 columns desktop (>1024px), 2 tablet (768-1024px), 1 mobile (<768px). 16px gutters
Expected_Utilities: slds-grid, slds-wrap, slds-size_1-of-4, slds-medium-size_1-of-2, slds-small-size_1-of-1, slds-gutters
Key_Validation_Points: 4 desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile, 16px gaps
Success_Criteria: 6 cards in grid, responsive classes 4-2-1, slds-gutters 16px spacing
Accessibility_Requirements: Grid accessible, cards keyboard navigable
Common_Failure_Modes: Wrong column counts, breakpoints broken, gutters missing

Utterance: Create a responsive product card grid using SLDS grid system with sizing utilities for desktop (4 columns using quarter-width sizing), tablet (2 columns using half-width sizing), and mobile (1 column using full-width sizing). Apply column padding for consistent gutters between cards. Display 6 product cards each containing image, title, and price. Cards should use standard SLDS card styling with border-radius from design system utilities, shadow from elevation tokens, and hover effects using SLDS interaction styling with appropriate motion timing
Expected_Utilities: slds-grid, slds-wrap, slds-size_1-of-4, slds-medium-size_1-of-2, slds-small-size_1-of-1, slds-col_padded
Key_Validation_Points: Breakpoints ≥standard dimensions from SLDS (4 cols), 768-standard dimensions from SLDS (2 cols), <standard dimensions from SLDS (1 col), gaps standard size from SLDS, cards standard dimensions from SLDS, radius standard size from SLDS, hover scale 1.02 200ms, shadow 2→4
Success_Criteria: slds-size_1-of-4 (25%), slds-medium-size_1-of-2 (50%), slds-small-size_1-of-1 (100%), slds-col_padded SLDS text size padding (SLDS text size gap), 6 cards height standard dimensions from SLDS, border-radius standard size from SLDS, hover: transform scale(1.02) transition 200ms, box-shadow elevation 2→4
Accessibility_Requirements: Grid accessible, cards keyboard navigable, hover effects have focus equivalent
Common_Failure_Modes: Breakpoints wrong, percentages off, gaps not 16px, height not 280px, scale wrong, transition timing off, hover only (no focus)

Implement step transitions with appropriate animation timing from SLDS motion tokens

Key_Validation_Points: Table allows inline editing
Success_Criteria: Table displays with some columns editable inline
Accessibility_Requirements: Table accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Editing not working, accessibility missing

Utterance: Employee table: Name (read-only), Department (dropdown, editable), Salary (editable), Status (badge). Allow inline editing on Department and Salary
Key_Validation_Points: Department and Salary editable inline, Status shows badges
Success_Criteria: Datatable with 4 columns, Department editable dropdown, Salary editable number, Status badges with colors, inline editing enabled
Accessibility_Requirements: Inline edit keyboard accessible, edit mode announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Wrong columns editable, badges missing, inline edit broken

Utterance: Create an employee data table with Name column (read-only text, using appropriate width from sizing utilities), Department column (editable dropdown with 4 options: Sales, Engineering, Marketing, Support, appropriate width), Salary column (editable currency format, appropriate width), and Status column (badges using semantic colors - Active uses success, Inactive uses error, appropriate width). Include 10 employee rows. Implement inline editing: double-click cell to show input or dropdown, Enter saves changes, ESC cancels editing. Save button appears when any edits are pending. Edited cells should highlight using appropriate feedback colors until saved
Key_Validation_Points: Columns 30-25-25-20%, Department dropdown 4 options editable, Salary currency editable, Status badges exact colors, double-click edit, Enter saves ESC cancels, save button appears, edited yellow
Success_Criteria: Columns 30-25-25-20%, Name read-only, Department inline edit dropdown with 4 options, Salary inline edit currency format, Status badges Active Inactive , 10 rows, double-click enters edit mode, Enter saves ESC cancels, Save button appears when editing, edited cells background until saved
Accessibility_Requirements: Table accessible, inline edit keyboard operable (double-click alternative), edit mode announced, Enter/ESC handling announced, Save button accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Column widths wrong, Department not dropdown or missing options, Salary not currency, Status colors wrong/hardcoded, double-click not working, Enter/ESC not working, Save button missing, edited cells not highlighting, ARIA incomplete

Key_Validation_Points: Sidebar shows various filter inputs
Success_Criteria: Filter panel with search, date inputs, checkboxes, apply button
Accessibility_Requirements: Filters accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Inputs missing, apply button missing

Key_Validation_Points: All filter types present, badge shows count
Success_Criteria: Sidebar with search, date range, price slider, checkboxes, apply button, badge shows active count
Accessibility_Requirements: All filters keyboard accessible, slider keyboard controlled, count announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Slider not working, badge wrong count, keyboard broken

Utterance: Create a filter sidebar using standard SLDS sidebar width in fixed position. Include search input at standard height, date range section with two date inputs at standard height each, price range slider with custom handles and track using appropriate sizing (range $0-$1000 with values displayed above handles), category checkboxes (5 options in vertical stack with proper spacing between each using SLDS spacing utilities). Apply Filters button should be full width using brand styling at standard button height. Active filter count badge should use appropriate badge sizing with brand background and contrasting text, positioned at button top-right. Sidebar should use surface background colors with right border from SLDS border utilities
Key_Validation_Points: Width standard dimensions from SLDS fixed, search standard size from SLDS, dates standard size from SLDS each, slider: handles standard size from SLDS track standard size from SLDS range $0-$1000 values above, checkboxes standard size from SLDS vertical, Apply 100% × standard size from SLDS brand, badge standard size from SLDS circle blue white top-right, sidebar bg border-right standard size from SLDS
Success_Criteria: Sidebar width standard dimensions from SLDS position fixed, search height standard size from SLDS, date inputs standard size from SLDS, price slider: handles standard size from SLDS circles track standard size from SLDS height range 0-1000 values display above handles, checkboxes standard size from SLDS height stacked, Apply width 100% height standard size from SLDS brand, badge standard size from SLDS diameter circle brand background white text positioned absolute top-right, sidebar background border-right standard size from SLDS
Accessibility_Requirements: Sidebar keyboard accessible, search announces results, date picker accessible, slider keyboard draggable with arrow keys announces values, checkboxes keyboard selectable, Apply keyboard accessible, badge count announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Width not 280px or not fixed, input heights wrong, slider handles/track wrong sizes or values not displaying, checkboxes wrong height or not stacked, Apply wrong dimensions, badge wrong size or positioning off, colors hardcoded/wrong, keyboard controls broken, ARIA incomplete

Utterance: Create custom button (no hardcoded colors)
Key_Validation_Points: Button uses
Success_Criteria: Button background and text use CSS variables (*), no hex colors
Accessibility_Requirements: Button accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Hardcoded colors, hooks missing

Utterance: Create custom button : background , text . Button adapts when theme changes. No hardcoded hex colors
Key_Validation_Points: Background uses accent-2, text uses on-accent, no hex
Success_Criteria: Button CSS uses var() background, var() text, adapts to theme
Accessibility_Requirements: Button maintains accessibility in all themes, contrast meets WCAG
Common_Failure_Modes: Uses hardcoded #colors, hooks not used, doesn't adapt to themes

Utterance: Create a fully themed custom button component that exclusively uses SLDS design tokens and styling hooks. Background should use accent color tokens (level 2), text should use on-accent color token for proper contrast, border should use darker accent token (level 3). Padding should reference SLDS spacing tokens, font-size should use SLDS typography tokens, border-radius should use SLDS border-radius token. Hover state uses darker accent background (level 3). Focus state uses brand color for outline with appropriate offset, all from design tokens. Ensure zero hardcoded pixel or hex color values - everything must be SLDS tokens that adapt to theme changes
Key_Validation_Points: Background accent-2, text on-accent, border accent-3, padding spacing-4 spacing-6, font-size typography-body-1, radius border-radius-small, hover accent-3, focus outline brand-base-2 offset standard size from SLDS, all hooks no hardcoded
Success_Criteria: background: var(), color: var(), border: standard size from SLDS solid var(), padding: var() var(), font-size: var(), border-radius: var(), hover background: var(), focus outline: standard size from SLDS solid var() offset standard size from SLDS, ZERO hardcoded px/hex/rgb values
Accessibility_Requirements: Button accessible, color contrast maintained in light/dark themes via hooks, focus visible meets 3:1, keyboard accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Any hardcoded values (px, hex, rgb) used, hooks incomplete, hover/focus states hardcoded, doesn't adapt to theme changes, contrast fails in one theme

Success_Criteria: Card width standard dimensions from SLDS height standard dimensions from SLDS centered viewport (flexbox or absolute), background white, border-radius standard size from SLDS, box-shadow elevation 4, logo height standard dimensions from SLDS margin-bottom standard size from SLDS, email/password width 100% height standard size from SLDS, password relative with eye icon standard size from SLDS absolute right, checkbox standard size from SLDS, Forgot link float right blue, Sign In width 100% height standard size from SLDS brand, Create link centered, input spacing standard size from SLDS between, card padding standard size from SLDS

Success_Criteria: 4 metric cards in grid, each shows icon, value, label

Common_Failure_Modes: Cards unequal, icon/value sizes wrong, trends not colored correctly

Cards should have equal height from design system with spacing between using SLDS gutter utilities. Each card includes icon at standard size with proper top margin, metric value using large heading size from SLDS typography scale with bold weight and center alignment, label using standard text size with neutral colors also centered, and trend indicator with icon at standard size plus percentage text (positive trends use success colors with up arrow, negative trends use error colors with down arrow). Cards use white background with border-radius from utilities and shadow from elevation tokens. Implement hover effect that increases shadow elevation using appropriate motion timing
Key_Validation_Points: Cards 25% each height standard dimensions from SLDS gaps standard size from SLDS, icon standard size from SLDS margin standard size from SLDS, value SLDS text size bold, label SLDS text size , trend: arrow standard size from SLDS + % SLDS text size (positive green up, negative red down), hover shadow 2→4 200ms
Success_Criteria: Grid slds-size_1-of-4 (25% each), height standard dimensions from SLDS uniform, gaps standard size from SLDS via slds-col_padded, background white, border-radius standard size from SLDS, box-shadow elevation 2, icon standard size from SLDS margin-top standard size from SLDS, value font-size SLDS text size weight 700 text-align center, label font-size SLDS text size color center, trend: arrow standard size from SLDS + text SLDS text size, positive: green utility:trending_up, negative: red utility:trending_down, hover: shadow elevation 4 transition 200ms
Accessibility_Requirements: Cards keyboard accessible, metrics have labels, trend direction announced not color alone, hover has focus equivalent

Utterance: Create modal with form (5 fields). Ensure focus trap and ESC closes
Expected_Components: Modal with form and focus management
Key_Validation_Points: Modal has focus trap, ESC closes
Success_Criteria: Modal displays form with 5 fields, focus trapped, ESC closes
Accessibility_Requirements: Modal fully accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Focus not trapped, ESC not working

Utterance: Modal with 5-field form. Focus management: opens → first input, Tab cycles within modal, ESC closes and returns focus. All fields have labels and validation
Key_Validation_Points: Opens focus first input, Tab cycles, ESC returns focus, fields validated
Success_Criteria: Modal with 5 inputs, on open focus moves to first field, Tab cycles through modal only, ESC closes and returns focus to trigger, all fields labeled and validated
Accessibility_Requirements: aria-labelledby, focus trap works, ESC handling, form validation accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Focus not moving, Tab escapes modal, ESC not returning focus, validation broken

Utterance: Create a fully accessible modal containing a 5-field form. Implement comprehensive focus management: on modal open, focus programmatically moves to first input field, Tab key cycles through all inputs and close button within modal only using keyboard event listeners (focus trap), Shift+Tab reverses direction, ESC key closes modal and returns focus to the element that opened it (storing reference), backdrop click also closes modal. All form fields must have explicit labels with proper for attributes. Required fields should have appropriate ARIA required attribute. Validation on blur should set ARIA invalid attribute and link to error message using ARIA describedby. Modal container must have proper dialog role, ARIA labelledby pointing to title, and ARIA modal attribute set to true
Expected_Utilities: slds-modal, slds-modal__container, slds-modal__header, slds-modal__content, slds-modal__footer, slds-backdrop
Key_Validation_Points: Open → focus first input (JS), Tab cycles input1-5→close→input1 (trap), Shift+Tab reverses, ESC closes returns focus (store ref), backdrop closes, labels with for, required aria-required, validation aria-invalid + aria-describedby, role dialog aria-labelledby aria-modal
Success_Criteria: On open: element.focus() on first input, Tab keydown listener: if on last element (close X) focus input1, if on first input + Shift+Tab focus close X, ESC keydown: close modal, store opener reference, focus(opener), backdrop click: close modal, all labels have for matching input id, required inputs aria-required="true", blur validation: set aria-invalid="true", aria-describedby="error-id", modal container role="dialog", aria-labelledby="title-id", aria-modal="true"
Accessibility_Requirements: Modal announced as dialog, title announced via aria-labelledby, focus moves to first input, Tab cycles only within modal, Shift+Tab reverses, ESC closes announced, focus returns announced, required state announced, validation errors announced via aria-describedby
Common_Failure_Modes: Focus not moving to first input, Tab escapes modal (no trap), Shift+Tab not working, ESC not closing or focus not returning, backdrop not closing, labels missing for attribute, aria-required missing, aria-invalid not set on validation, aria-describedby not linking, modal missing role/aria-labelledby/aria-modal

Utterance: Create sales path with 4 stages: Prospecting, Qualification, Proposal, Closed Won
Key_Validation_Points: Path shows 4 stages
Success_Criteria: Path displays 4 stages in sequence
Accessibility_Requirements: Path keyboard navigable

Utterance: Create a sales opportunity path component with 4 stages using standard SLDS path height. Prospecting stage shows completed state with success background colors and checkmark icon at standard size in contrasting color. Qualification stage shows current state with brand background colors and text using appropriate heading size with bold weight in contrasting color. Proposal and Closed Won stages show incomplete state with neutral background colors and text using standard size with neutral text colors. Clicking any stage opens a popover at standard SLDS popover width positioned below the stage. Current stage popover includes "Mark Status as Complete" button using brand styling at full width with standard button height
Key_Validation_Points: Height standard size from SLDS, Prospecting: green check standard size from SLDS white, Qualification: blue text SLDS text size bold white, others: gray text SLDS text size , click opens popover standard dimensions from SLDS, current has Mark Complete button brand 100% × standard size from SLDS
Success_Criteria: Path height standard size from SLDS, Prospecting: background checkmark standard size from SLDS color white, Qualification: background font-size SLDS text size weight 700 color white, Proposal/Closed Won: background font-size SLDS text size color , click handler opens popover width standard dimensions from SLDS positioned below, current popover contains "Mark Status as Complete" button brand width 100% height standard size from SLDS
Accessibility_Requirements: Path role="list", stages role="listitem", current aria-current="step", popover role="dialog" aria-labelledby, focus trap in popover, Mark Complete keyboard accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Height not 48px, colors hardcoded/wrong, checkmark not 16px, text sizes wrong, popover not 320px or wrong position, button missing or wrong size, aria-current missing, popover ARIA incomplete

Utterance: Create a file tree structure with proper indentation using SLDS spacing scale multiplied by level depth (level 1 has no indent, level 2 uses one spacing unit, level 3 uses two spacing units). Tree items use standard height from design system. Each item displays icon at standard size (chevron for expandable folders, file icon for files) with proper spacing from text. Folder chevron icons rotate 90 degrees on expand using appropriate motion timing. Expanded folders display children with connecting lines using border utility with neutral colors running vertically from parent to last child. Selected item uses selection background color with brand text color. Tree should support 3 levels of nesting
Expected_Components: Custom tree with lines and animations
Key_Validation_Points: Indent standard size from SLDS per level (0/24/48), items standard size from SLDS height, icons standard size from SLDS gap standard size from SLDS text SLDS text size, chevron rotates 90° 200ms, lines standard size from SLDS vertical parent-to-last-child, selected: bg text
Success_Criteria: Indentation: level 1 margin-left 0, level 2 standard size from SLDS, level 3 standard size from SLDS, items height standard size from SLDS, icon standard size from SLDS margin-right standard size from SLDS, text font-size SLDS text size, folder chevron rotate 90deg transition 200ms on expand, connecting lines standard size from SLDS border-left from parent to last child, selected: background color
Accessibility_Requirements: Tree role="tree", items role="treeitem", folders aria-expanded, arrow keys navigate, Enter expands/collapses, selection announced, level announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Indentation not multiples of 24px, item heights wrong, icons not 20px or gap wrong, text size wrong, chevron not rotating or transition wrong, connecting lines missing/wrong, selected colors hardcoded/wrong, roles/ARIA missing

Utterance: Create lookup field for searching and selecting an Account
Key_Validation_Points: Lookup searches and selects record
Success_Criteria: Lookup searches Account records, selects one
Accessibility_Requirements: Lookup keyboard accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Search not working, selection broken

Utterance: Account lookup: search input with icon, dropdown shows matching Accounts with icon and name, selecting shows as pill with remove. Minimum 2 characters to search
Key_Validation_Points: Search input, dropdown matches, selected as pill with remove, min 2 chars
Success_Criteria: Search input with icon, typing filters Accounts (min 2 chars), dropdown shows icon+name, selecting shows pill with remove X
Accessibility_Requirements: Search keyboard accessible, min length announced, results announced, selection announced, pill removable
Common_Failure_Modes: Min 2 chars not enforced, results not filtering, selected not showing as pill

Utterance: Create an Account lookup component using standard SLDS input dimensions. Search icon at appropriate size positioned inside left with proper margin and placeholder text "Search Accounts...". Typing with minimum 2 characters displays dropdown at input width with maximum height from design system. Each search result uses standard list item height displaying Account icon at standard size, name using standard text size with bold weight, and subtitle (industry) using smaller text size with neutral colors. Empty state shows "No matches found" message centered with neutral colors. When account is selected, display as pill using standard pill height with Account icon at smaller size, name using standard text size, and remove button at appropriate icon size. Clicking remove clears the selection and input field
Key_Validation_Points: Input 400×standard size from SLDS icon standard size from SLDS left margin standard size from SLDS placeholder "Search Accounts...", dropdown standard dimensions from SLDS max-height standard dimensions from SLDS: results standard size from SLDS icon standard size from SLDS name SLDS text size bold subtitle SLDS text size gray, no results "No matches found", selected: pill standard size from SLDS icon standard size from SLDS name SLDS text size X standard size from SLDS, remove clears
Success_Criteria: Input width standard dimensions from SLDS height standard size from SLDS, search icon standard size from SLDS margin-left standard size from SLDS, placeholder text, input listener min 2 chars triggers search, dropdown width standard dimensions from SLDS max-height standard dimensions from SLDS, results height standard size from SLDS Account icon standard size from SLDS name font-size SLDS text size weight 700, subtitle font-size SLDS text size color gray, empty state "No matches found" centered, selected: pill height standard size from SLDS icon standard size from SLDS name font-size SLDS text size remove standard size from SLDS, remove handler clears selection and input
Accessibility_Requirements: Search aria-autocomplete="list", min 2 chars announced, results count announced, arrow keys navigate results, Enter selects, selected announced, pill remove keyboard accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Input dimensions wrong, icon not 16px or margin wrong, min 2 chars not enforced, dropdown wrong size, result heights wrong, icon not 32px, text sizes wrong, empty state missing, pill dimensions wrong, icon not 24px, remove not 20px, remove not clearing input, ARIA incomplete

Utterance: Create form where selecting "Other" in dropdown shows additional text field
Key_Validation_Points: Field appears when "Other" selected
Success_Criteria: Dropdown with options, selecting "Other" reveals text input
Accessibility_Requirements: Dynamic field announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Conditional field not appearing

Utterance: Form: Reason dropdown (5 options + "Other"). When "Other" selected: "Please specify" text input appears below with fade-in. When other option selected: field hides
Key_Validation_Points: Dropdown 5 + Other, selecting Other shows input with fade 200ms, other selection hides
Success_Criteria: Dropdown 6 options, selecting "Other" shows input below with fade-in 200ms, selecting non-Other hides input
Accessibility_Requirements: Dropdown change announces, additional field appearance announced, validation considers dynamic field
Common_Failure_Modes: Field not appearing, no animation, appearance not announced

Utterance: Create a dynamic form with Reason dropdown using standard SLDS input sizing containing 5 options (Bug, Feature Request, Question, Feedback, Other). When "Other" option is selected, display "Please specify" text input below with fade-in animation using appropriate motion timing (opacity transition), standard input height from design system, and required validation showing "This field is required" error message. When switching away from Other option, implement fade-out animation with appropriate timing then hide the field, clear its value, and remove required validation. Form submit should validate that if Other is selected, the specify field must contain a value, displaying errors using SLDS error styling
Expected_Components: Form with conditional field and validation
Key_Validation_Points: Dropdown 300×standard size from SLDS 6 options, Other: shows input below fade 300ms standard size from SLDS required validation "required", switch away: fade 200ms hide clear unrequire, form validates specify if Other
Success_Criteria: Dropdown width standard dimensions from SLDS height standard size from SLDS options: Bug/Feature Request/Question/Feedback/Other, change listener: if value=="Other" show input (opacity 0→1 transition 300ms), input height standard size from SLDS required=true, validation "This field is required", if value!="Other" hide input (opacity 1→0 transition 200ms display:none), clear value, required=false, form submit validates: if dropdown==Other input must have value
Accessibility_Requirements: Dropdown change announced, conditional field appearance announced via aria-live, required state announced when appears, validation error announced if empty and Other selected
Common_Failure_Modes: Dropdown dimensions wrong, Other not triggering, fade timing wrong, input height wrong, required not adding, validation missing, switching away not hiding/clearing, form submit not validating, aria-live not announcing

Utterance: Create success toast that auto-dismisses after 3 seconds
Key_Validation_Points: Toast appears and dismisses after 3s
Success_Criteria: Toast displays success styling, auto-dismisses after 3000ms
Accessibility_Requirements: Toast announced
Common_Failure_Modes: Not auto-dismissing, wrong timing

Utterance: Success toast: green background, success icon 24px, message "Action completed successfully", close button. Appears bottom-right, auto-dismisses after 3 seconds, slide-in animation
Key_Validation_Points: Bottom-right, green bg, icon 24px, message, close, auto-dismiss 3s, slide-in
Success_Criteria: Toast fixed bottom-right, green background, success icon 24px, message, close button, appears with slide-in, auto-dismisses 3000ms
Accessibility_Requirements: role="alert", auto-dismiss announced, close button accessible
Common_Failure_Modes: Position wrong, icon wrong size, timing wrong, animation missing

Utterance: Create a success toast notification fixed to bottom-right of viewport with proper margin spacing from edges. Toast should use standard SLDS toast dimensions with success background and contrasting foreground colors, border-radius from utilities, and shadow from elevation tokens. Include success icon at standard size with proper left margin, message text using standard text size positioned center-left, and close button at appropriate size with proper right margin. Toast appears with slide-in animation from right using appropriate motion timing. Auto-dismiss after 3 seconds with fade-out animation using appropriate timing then remove from DOM. Hovering over toast cancels the auto-dismiss timer. Clicking close button immediately triggers fade-out and removal. Toast must have alert role for screen reader announcement
Key_Validation_Points: Fixed bottom-right margin standard size from SLDS, 320×standard size from SLDS, green white text SLDS text size, radius standard size from SLDS shadow 4, icon standard size from SLDS white left margin standard size from SLDS, message center-left, X standard size from SLDS right margin standard size from SLDS, appear: slide translateX(100%→0) 300ms, auto 3000ms fade 200ms remove, hover cancels, X: fade remove
Success_Criteria: position fixed bottom standard size from SLDS right standard size from SLDS, width standard dimensions from SLDS height standard size from SLDS, background , color white font-size SLDS text size, border-radius standard size from SLDS, box-shadow elevation 4, icon standard size from SLDS color white margin-left standard size from SLDS, message text-align left, close standard size from SLDS right margin-right standard size from SLDS, appear: transform translateX(100%→0) transition 300ms ease-out, setTimeout 3000ms fade-out opacity 0 transition 200ms then remove, mouseenter clears timeout, mouseleave restarts, close click: opacity 0 transition 200ms then remove
Accessibility_Requirements: role="alert" announces immediately, auto-dismiss announced "Will close in 3 seconds", close button keyboard accessible, focus moves away after dismiss
Common_Failure_Modes: Position not bottom-right or margins wrong, dimensions wrong, bg hardcoded/wrong, text size/color wrong, radius wrong, shadow missing, icon not 24px or margins wrong, close not 24px, slide-in animation wrong direction/timing, auto-dismiss not 3000ms or fade wrong, hover not canceling, close not immediate, role missing, dismiss not announced
